page.title: 05FARM.,SOCIAL LIFE,AUCHINLECK
page.content: The farmers in the Auchinleck area are an active community group. The women organise guilds at which there are;dancing,baking,sewing, demonstrations and outings. Sporting activities for Farmers groups include Bowling,Curling and Shooting. The Young Farmer's Club organises activities aimed at the younger age group ;Discos,Car Rallies and visits. There are a few local agricultural shows but the highlight of the farming community's year is The Ayr Agricultural Show,which is held annually in May.
